sentences.en: The heckler made a score off the referee.

sentences.en: When comic Michael Richards was unnerved by an African American heckler at a comedy club several years ago, he responded with a racial-slur-laced tirade.
sentences.cn: 当喜剧演员迈克尔·理查德斯几年前在一个喜剧俱乐部被一位美国黑人质问者搞得懊恼不安时，他用了一大段带种族侮辱色彩的话作回应。
